seo.title: Manarola Beaches 2025 | Swimming Spots & Rocky Shores
seo.description: Best swimming spots in Manarola. Rocky beaches, cliff jumping, and crystal-clear Mediterranean waters.

body.title: Beaches & Swimming
body.subtitle: No sandy beaches here, but dramatic rocky shores and crystal-clear waters perfect for swimming, sunbathing, and cliff jumping.

features.title: Marina Swimming Area
features.description: Main swimming spot by the harbor. Flat rocks for sunbathing and easy water access.

features.title: Cliff Jumping Rocks
features.description: Popular spot for brave swimmers. Jump from various heights into deep blue water.

features.title: Harbor Boat Ramp
features.description: Gentle entry point. Good for families and less confident swimmers.

features.title: Snorkeling Area
features.description: Clear waters around the rocks. See fish and underwater rock formations.

features.title: Punta Bonfiglio Rocks
features.description: Quieter swimming spot below the cemetery viewpoint. More private.

features.title: Via dell'Amore Access
features.description: Small rocky areas accessible from the coastal path. Secluded swimming.
